about_the_game: Hack and slash your way through the ancient gods of Egypt in this action-packed rogue-lite developed by a team of two. Explore randomly generated dungeons, unlock powerful abilities and obliterate your enemies with devastating combos!
detailed_description: Hack and slash your way through the ancient gods of Egypt in this action-packed rogue-lite developed by a team of two. Explore randomly generated dungeons, unlock powerful abilities and obliterate your enemies with devastating combos!
name: Fall of Gods Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hack and slash your way through the ancient gods of Egypt in this action-packed rogue-lite developed by a team of two. Explore randomly generated dungeons, unlock powerful abilities and obliterate your enemies with devastating combos!
